channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 23:18 Alarm lifted in Kyiv. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 23:18 Alarm lifted in Kyiv. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_city This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 22:26 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 22:26 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovska territorial community. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region#쮏쥄쮏쒬혧햨햟_혝햣햦혝쮐햦햟햩혧햫햟_햡쮏쨿썛얧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 10:25 p.m. The alarm was sounded in Zvenyhorodsky district. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 10:25 p.m. The alarm was sounded in Zvenyhorodsky district. Stay tuned for further messages. #행쒫왏쫨햡쮐쮏얨혧햨햦햧_햟햧쮏 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 22:21 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover!
item.description: 游댮 22:21 Threat of artillery shelling! Now there is artillery shelling in the Pokrovska territorial community. Take cover! #Pokrovska_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
